title: Can I have publications without any co author or without any academic affiliation? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm not an expert in this area..However, I have never come across an "instructions to authors" page for any journal that required a co-author or an affiliation with an academic institution. Before submitting an article to any journal, it is a good idea to look at their "instructions to authors"..page for valuable information on what kinds of articles they accept.
